title: Schmitz: People in China are struggling to keep up with change
itunes:title: Schmitz: People in China are struggling to keep up with change
description:
Quest Global's Robert Schmitz discusses his new book "Street of Eternal Happiness". He speaks with Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
